name: SWAP (itch) (PerfMouse Studios)
description:
This is my Extra Credits Game Jam!
Its a 2D platformer where you change directions with SWAPING!

The game currently has 2 levels but more versions are coming!

the controls: 

movement: A(Left) D(Right) - Space

swap: RightShift/LeftShift

This game is made in 48h for the Extra Credits GameJam!

This is my first game I have ever complete finished (And first GameJam done), and it all was done with a mouse...

Hope you enjoy!
